name: 3PQ edit 1.1
description:
All interactions are designed to be as simple and intuitive as possible. 
WASD for movement,
Q and E for rotation,
left click/right click for interaction,
and backspace to restart a stage. 

——

Here are a list of edits we've made:

  1. Aspect ratio changed from 16:10 to 16:9, the correct one.

Here are a list of edits we are working on:

  1. Fixing multiple identified geometry bugs
  2. Fixing bugs with the momentum and friction of pieces
  3. Fixing leg and face animations to work as intended
  4. Allow the player to reset every level
  5. Level select/save progress
  6. Fixing music timings
  7. Fixing bug where entering a stage doesn't disconnect all connected pieces
  8. Fixing bug where two levels are skipped when one level finishes
  9. Add a more meaningful ending
  10. Write something in the sign under the staircase
  11. Potentially rehash the visuals to be more cohesive
  12. Tweak Movement to feel less heavy

——

In a world with walking puzzle pieces, sassy signs and gravity defying objects, a lone puzzle piece ventures out on its quest for freedom. Control it and its brethren in order to escape and journey to the outside world.

This game was made for Brackey's 2021.1 Game Jam.

Collaborators: NotLivingPool (General manager/Secondary programmer/Secondary Level Designer), Joshuc (Lead programmer), eeaann9044 (Background artist/Tertiary programmer), Jickamangah (Animator/Level Designer/Asset Artist/Musician), Kintama54 (Lead Asset Artist), JuliusC (Lead Musician)
